mapper.insert: insert into customer( store_id, first_name, last_name, email, address_id ) values ( #{storeId}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{email}, #{addressId} )
mapper.select: select customer_id customerId, store_id storeId, first_name firstName, last_name lastName, address_id addressId, email, active, create_date createDate, last_update lastUpdate from customer order by customer_id desc limit #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
